summary: A Scotland Yard undercover detective is on the trail of a saboteur who is part of a plot to set off a bomb in London. But when the detective's cover is blown, the plot begins to unravel.
cast: Sylvia Sidney|Oskar Homolka|Desmond Tester|John Loder|Joyce Barbour|Matthew Boulton|S.J. Warmington|William Dewhurst|Pamela Bevan|Peter Bull|Albert Chevalier|Clare Greet|Charles Hawtrey|Alfred Hitchcock|Martita Hunt|Mike Johnson|J. Hubert Leslie|Aubrey Mather|Frederick Piper|Fred Schwartz|Torin Thatcher|Austin Trevor|Jack Vyvyan|Hal Walters|Sam Wilkinson
keywords: birdcage|imitating a bird|songbird|stabbed in the stomach|undercover police officer
title: La mujer solitaria
